title: Drupa 2008 - Invitation
content:
Drupa 2008: May, 29 to June, 11, 2008 in Duesseldorf, Germany:  
 [http://www.drupa.de/cipp/md\_drupa/custom/pub/content,lang,2/oid,11265/ti...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165913/http:/www.drupa.de/cipp/md_drupa/custom/pub/content,lang,2/oid,11265/ticket,g_u_e_s_t/~/print_media_messe_-_drupa.html "http://www.drupa.de/cipp/md\_drupa/custom/pub/content,lang,2/oid,11265/ticket,g\_u\_e\_s\_t/~/print\_media\_messe\_-\_drupa.html")

I am born in Duesseldorf - drupa city.  
And since more than 30 years I take the chance to meet guys from our industry.

Is someone of you visiting drupa 2008?  
Are you interested to visit our lead letter magazine?  
Just let me know - you are welcome.  
Preußisches Bleisatz-Magazine is just 15 minutes from drupa 2008

[http://www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front\_content.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165913/http:/www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front_content.php "http://www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front\_content.php")

Georg

 [‹ Seeking advice: Which b+w laser printer?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165913/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43438 "Go to previous forum topic") [The line between inspiration and stealing ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165913/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43435 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bleisetzer

comments.content:
Hi George,

Unfortunately I will not be able to be there ;) Thank you for the lead letter magazine link. I love Heidelbergs and Rolands ...
I will be there for 4 days, Georg. It would be nice to visit your rooms.

Give me a short call or email in the morning you wanna visit us.  
Just to make sure, I’m in.

For everyone:  
 [http://www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front\_content.php?idcat=51](http://web.archive.org/web/20080414165913/http:/www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front_content.php?idcat=51 "http://www.bleisetzer.de/cms/front\_content.php?idcat=51")

I’ll visit Drupa, too.  
Just to say Hello to old partners of Atex.

Georg  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
„Ich bin ein Preuße, kennt Ihr meine Farben...“
